title: Diploma in QuickBooks Desktop Canada
headline: The free online course on how QuickBooks works, its customization, as well as receiving payments and managing deposits.
description: This free online QuickBooks desktop Canada course teaches you about how to work with the QuickBooks software in accounting, as well as using the Easy Step Interview and opening a second company file. You will learn about how to customize preferences in QuickBooks. You will also be able to learn how to manage payments, handle down payments, as well as issue invoices to customers. Start this course today to improve your understanding of QuickBooks.

courseDescription:
QuickBooks Desktop Canada is a free online course that begins by introducing you to the accounting software called QuickBooks, as well as it uses in managing a business. The course will also introduce you to how QuickBooks works, as well as how to set up your company file on QuickBooks and using the Easy Step Interview to set up a company on QuickBooks. The steps for getting around in QuickBooks, starting and exiting QuickBooks, as well as opening a second company file will also be covered in this course.

This course then explains the different customizable options available in QuickBooks, as well as the process for customizing preferences on QuickBooks. You will learn the step by step process for setting up different users on QuickBooks, as well as how to set up the chart of accounts feature on QuickBooks. This course will then teach you through various exercises the ways to create a new account or company, as well as how to assign different important information to the new company.

Furthermore, this course will help you get familiar with the customer centre in QuickBooks, as well as creating new customers and jobs. You will learn about the process for preparing estimates, as well as drawing up invoices from the estimates. You will also learn about receiving payments, as well as handling customer down payments, and using the income tracker. This free online course will be of great interest to students, researchers, and anyone with an interest in handling accounts. Register for this course and start your next learning journey today.

Start Course Now
certificateDetail:
All Alison courses are free to enrol study and complete. To successfully complete this diploma course and become an Alison Graduate, you need to achieve 80% or higher in each course assessment. Once you have completed this diploma course, you have the option to acquire an official Diploma, which is a great way to share your achievement with the world.

Your Alison diploma is:
  • Ideal for sharing with potential employers
  • Include it in your CV, professional social media profiles and job applications.
  • An indication of your commitment to continuously learn, upskill & achieve high results.
  • An incentive for you to continue empowering yourself through lifelong learning.
Alison offers 3 types of Diplomas for completed Diploma courses:
  • Digital diploma: a downloadable diploma in PDF format immediately available to you when you complete your purchase.
  • diploma: a physical version of your officially branded and security-marked diploma, posted to you with FREE shipping.
  • Framed diploma: a physical version of your officially branded and security marked diploma in a stylish frame, posted to you with FREE shipping.
Start Course Now

All diploma are available to purchase through the Alison Shop. For more information on purchasing Alison diploma, please visit our FAQs. If you decide not to purchase your Alison diploma, you can still demonstrate your achievement by sharing your Learner Record or Learner Achievement Verification, both of which are accessible from your Dashboard. For more details on our diploma pricing, please visit our Pricing Page

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module, you will be introduced to how QuickBooks work, as well as how to set up your company file on QuickBooks and using the Easy Step Interview to set up a company on QuickBooks. You will also be introduced to the steps for getting around in QuickBooks, starting and exiting QuickBooks, as well as opening a second company file.

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module, you will be introduced to the process for customizing preferences on QuickBooks, as well as setting up different users on QuickBooks. You will also be introduced to the setup process for the chart of accounts on QuickBooks, as well as try out an exercise to create a new account and assign different variables.
topics: Customizing the QuickBooks Environment - Learning Outcomes

modules.description: In this module, you will be introduced to the customer centre in QuickBooks, how to create customers and jobs, how to prepare estimates, as well as creating invoices from estimates. You will also be introduced to the process of receiving payments, entering overpayments, as well as handling customer down payments, and using the income tracker.
